Class com.datasalt.pangool.solr.TupleSolrOutputFormat extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.FileOutputFormat<ITuple,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable> implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

batchSize

int batchSize
Size of the batch size used for indexing

threadCount

int threadCount
The number of threads that will be used for indexing

queueSize

int queueSize
The SOLR writer queue size

outputZipFile

boolean outputZipFile
Whether the output should be a ZIP of the index or not

zipName

String zipName
The zip file name used for sending the SOLR configuration in the DistributedCache

localSolrHome

String localSolrHome
The local SOLR home to be used if this is run in Hadoop's local mode (no DC)

converter

TupleDocumentConverter converter
The document converter. By default, DefaultTupleDocumentConverter, but users may implement custom ones for boosting, etc.
